# availability

**Type Property**

A value that indicates the current state of Rosetta’s availability.

## Declaration

```swift
class var availability: VZLinuxRosettaAvailability { get }
```

## Discussion

The value is one of the possible [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZLinuxRosettaAvailability] values.

## Checking Rosetta availability

- **VZLinuxRosettaAvailability**: Constants that describe the availability and installation status of Rosetta.
